name: 3D Monster Kingdom Coin Dozer - Cute Creature Collector Arcade Game FREE!
name_original: 3D Monster Kingdom Coin Dozer - Cute Creature Collector Arcade Game FREE!
description:
One of the best Coin Dozer games on the market, this game takes it a step further. Drop the coins onto the dozer and let it push them down. If the coins drop in your tray, you get to keep them. Special Monster characters will land on your screen. Collect all the Cute Monsters for a special bonus. Can you collect all 40 monsters?

Earn Coins 50% Faster! Coins replentish every 20 seconds in game. More coins mean more fun! Coins also replentish when playing the game as well.

Booster coins help you out by adding walls, extra XP, giant coins and much more.

Shake the board to capture those coins on the edge.

What are you waiting for? Download today and start catching monsters!
